---
title: "github_missing_org_scope.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines authentication settings for a system, specifically focusing on GitHub authentication. It sets up the authentication requirements, session parameters, and GitHub-specific configuration details.

## Symbols

### `authentication`
#### Description
The root configuration object for authentication settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets authentication as required
- Configures session parameters
- Defines authentication methods, specifically GitHub in this case

### `authentication.required`
#### Description
A boolean flag indicating whether authentication is mandatory for the system.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| required | boolean | Set to `true`, indicating that authentication is required |

### `authentication.session`
#### Description
Configures session-related parameters for the authentication process.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the session domain to "http://localhost:8080"
- Disables secure sessions (likely for local development purposes)

### `authentication.methods.github`
#### Description
Configures GitHub as an authentication method with specific settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables GitHub authentication
- Sets client ID and secret for OAuth
- Configures redirect address
- Specifies required scopes
- Defines allowed organizations

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| authentication.required | boolean | true | Indicates if authentication is mandatory |
| authentication.session.domain | string | "http://localhost:8080" | The domain for the authentication session |
| authentication.session.secure | boolean | false | Whether the session should be secure (set to false, likely for development) |
| authentication.methods.github.enabled | boolean | true | Enables GitHub authentication |
| authentication.methods.github.client_id | string | "client_id" | The GitHub OAuth client ID |
| authentication.methods.github.client_secret | string | "client_secret" | The GitHub OAuth client secret |
| authentication.methods.github.redirect_address | string | "http://localhost:8080" | The redirect address after GitHub authentication |
| authentication.methods.github.scopes | array of strings | ["user:email"] | The GitHub OAuth scopes requested |
| authentication.methods.github.allowed_organizations | array of strings | ["github.com/flipt-io"] | The GitHub organizations allowed for authentication |

## Notes
1. This configuration appears to be for a local development environment, given the use of "localhost" and disabled secure sessions.
2. The file name suggests that this configuration is missing an organization scope, which might be intentional for testing purposes.
3. The GitHub authentication is set up to only allow users from the "github.com/flipt-io" organization.
4. The only GitHub scope requested is "user:email", which allows the application to read a user's email addresses.
